children.subject: Did the university actually increase EECS funding?
What will the department do of the v1.5 holistic admission proposal doesn’t get approved by the time the Fall 2023 application is open?

"the current proposal to reform L&S CS declaration starting in Fall 2023"

I believe it was also mentioned during the live town hall that this proposal is specifically for future incoming classes.
Will the proposed policy affect current students?

history.content:
Hi Everyone,

The EECS department, Data Science Undergraduate Studies, and the EECS union stewards for academic student employees are together hosting an Undergraduate Town Hall this Wednesday 4/27, 3:00pm - 5:30pm in Evans 10.

You can also join via Zoom at https://berkeley.zoom.us/j/94310938449?pwd=SXIwL1hxUDZuRWxyUGx2QStZUVdVUT09. It will be recorded and posted to the EECS 101 Piazza afterward.

This Town Hall will discuss declaration of the L&S Computer Science major, enrollments in CS/EE/EECS/Data courses, and instructional finances.

Here’s the planned agenda. Depending on the amount of discussion, the schedule could shift.

3:10 to 4:30pm: Josh Hug will lead an open discussion about the current proposal to reform L&S CS declaration starting in Fall 2023. Student feedback will be requested both live and via a Google form (to be distributed).

4:40 to 5:30pm: John DeNero will describe instructional costs and budgets for CS, EE, EECS, and Data courses, then answer questions. The primary purpose of this portion of the Town Hall is to increase transparency and student understanding of instructional finances.

We fully understand that the last week of the semester is busy for all of you. Thanks for your time and effort to attend and participate. A recording, slides, and feedback forms will be distributed afterward.

------- Recordings, Slides, and Feedback Forms -------


Town Hall Slides: https://tinyurl.com/townhall-0427

Fall 2023 Admissions Proposal v1.5: https://tinyurl.com/proposal-v1-5

Zoom recording (Passcode: townhall-0427):

https://berkeley.zoom.us/rec/share/7EypZs9PSKF2Yj_ia5jJaZ150jVqYgQcYGSalu5F9Lyx3acU9nMspXsQUf0BZvev.KcrdmoEajzAOjuBX 

Google Drive for Q&A, Transcript, Chat: https://tinyurl.com/townhall-0427-gdrive 

Student Feedback Form on L&S CS Admissions Proposal (due Friday, April 29): https://tinyurl.com/feedback-proposal-v1-5.

Contact the EECS Union Stewards and/or get involved with the ASE Union: https://tinyurl.com/union-eecs-feedback 

#pin
